description: This source file defines a React functional component named Sidebar that renders a navigational sidebar for a dashboard application. It includes props for controlling its state and navigation behavior, and generates menu items dynamically.

methods.name: Sidebar({ current, onNavigate, open = false, onClose })
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a sidebar navigation menu with open/close capabilities and items for 'Import', 'Analysis', and 'Dashboard'.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ current, onNavigate, open = false, onClose }) {$/

ctags.name: [ "bg-white border-r border-gray-200 h-screen top-0 z-40",  "w-64 md:w-64",  "fixed md:sticky",  "transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out",  open ? "translate-x-0" : "-translate-x-full md:translate-x-0", ]
